about_the_game:
Dungeon Reborn: Delve into Darkness

Embark on an epic journey into the heart of Dungeon Reborn, a captivating RPG dungeon crawler where danger lurks around every corner and untold treasures await the brave.

For a millennium, monsters were mere legend. Now, a fearsome Skeleton Lord and his legions have returned, plunging the realms into chaos. Embark on a perilous journey as a Hunter, destined to rise against this undead menace. Assemble a powerful party, master your skills, and uncover the secrets behind the skeletal invasion before the world is consumed by darkness.

Features:

  • Become a Legendary Guardian: Rise through the ranks of the ancient Guardian Order. Each rank unlocks powerful new abilities and enhances your attributes, making you a force to be reckoned with. Customize your Guardian with a variety of skills and talents to forge your own unique path to power.

  • Craft Your Arsenal: Scavenge resources and master the intricate art of crafting. Forge devastating weapons, resilient armor, and life-saving potions. Experiment with different materials and recipes to create legendary equipment that grants you an edge in battle.

  • Conquer Nightmare Dungeons: Hidden within the depths of each dungeon lie unstable portals to Nightmare Dungeons, otherworldly realms overflowing with formidable foes and incredible treasures. These challenging trials demand skillful combat and strategic thinking, but the rewards for those who prevail are immense. Obtain rare crafting materials and powerful artifacts to further enhance your arsenal.

  • Unravel the Mystery: A dark force stirs within the dungeons, corrupting the land and unleashing hordes of monstrous creatures. Uncover the secrets behind this growing evil as you delve deeper into the abyss. Encounter intriguing characters, complete challenging quests, and piece together the fragments of a forgotten history.

Prepare to face the ultimate test of skill and courage. Forge your destiny in Dungeon Reborn.

Dungeon Reborn: Delve into Darkness

Embark on an epic journey into the heart of Dungeon Reborn, a captivating RPG dungeon crawler where danger lurks around every corner and untold treasures await the brave.

For a millennium, monsters were mere legend. Now, a fearsome Skeleton Lord and his legions have returned, plunging the realms into chaos. Embark on a perilous journey as a Hunter, destined to rise against this undead menace. Assemble a powerful party, master your skills, and uncover the secrets behind the skeletal invasion before the world is consumed by darkness.

  • Become a Legendary Guardian: Rise through the ranks of the ancient Guardian Order. Each rank unlocks powerful new abilities and enhances your attributes, making you a force to be reckoned with. Customize your Guardian with a variety of skills and talents to forge your own unique path to power.

  • Craft Your Arsenal: Scavenge resources and master the intricate art of crafting. Forge devastating weapons, resilient armor, and life-saving potions. Experiment with different materials and recipes to create legendary equipment that grants you an edge in battle.

  • Conquer Nightmare Dungeons: Hidden within the depths of each dungeon lie unstable portals to Nightmare Dungeons, otherworldly realms overflowing with formidable foes and incredible treasures. These challenging trials demand skillful combat and strategic thinking, but the rewards for those who prevail are immense. Obtain rare crafting materials and powerful artifacts to further enhance your arsenal.

Uncover the secrets behind this growing evil as you delve deeper into the abyss. Encounter intriguing characters, complete challenging quests, and piece together the fragments of a forgotten history.

Prepare to face the ultimate test of skill and courage. Forge your destiny in Dungeon Reborn.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: Dungeon Reborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

short_description: Prepare to descend into the depths of Dungeon Reborn, a thrilling RPG dungeon crawler that will test your courage and cunning. Explore treacherous dungeons, battle hordes of fearsome foes, and uncover powerful loot.
